titles.title: Community Advantage Loan Program Permanency Act of 2022
Community Advantage Loan Program Permanency Act of 2022
A bill to authorize the Community Advantage Loan Program of the Small Business Administration, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.
Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship. Hearings held.

bill.summary:
Community Advantage Loan Program Permanency Act of 2022
This bill provides statutory authority for the Small Business Administration's Community Advantage Loan Program. The program provides access to capital for small business owners in underserved and low-to-moderate income communities.
